analysis: Market analysis indicates strong upward momentum with multiple bullish confirmations. RSI at 73.50 indicates overbought territory, suggesting caution for long positions. Money Flow Index at 69.63 suggests balanced volume distribution. MACD histogram positive with bullish crossover confirmed. Price maintaining above Bollinger middle band, uptrend intact. Price structure supports bullish continuation with MA and SAR confirmation. Ichimoku cloud analysis supports bullish bias.
